project_abstract.cdata: The Chongqing Industrial Pollution Control and Reform Project supports the Bank's lending strategy in China within a policy framework that focuses on enhanced industrial pollution control linked to enterprise reform and technological restructuring. Moreover, the project supports the government of China's efforts to help relatively underdeveloped regions in the interior catch up with the country's faster growing coastal areas. To achieve these objectives, the project will help Chongqing municipality (CM) to: 1) achieve a significant reduction in pollution and restructure productive facilities from its most polluting industry, iron and steel; 2) establish a strategy and prepare a long-term plan to achieve a major reduction in pollution for the whole industrial sector by, inter alia, increasing the effectiveness of CM's environmental regulatory framework and pollution management capability; and 3) initiate a pilot effort to assist industrial enterprises in other industrial sectors to restructure their productive facilities, control pollution and transform themselves into modern corporations. The project will include the following components: 1) support for development and implementation of economic and environmental policy agendas and action plans; 2) relocation of the city's two major polluting steel mills; 3) restructuring of advisory facilities for industrial enterprises; 4) a line of credit to support a pilot program in industrial enterprise reform, pollution control and restructuring; and 5) technical assistance to strengthen environmental regulation, surplus labor reemployment and innovation in state asset management.

P003646.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>重庆工业污染控制与改革项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是支持在政策框架下实施世行对华贷款战略，该框架注重在企业改革和技术改革的同时加强工业污染控制。此外，本项目也支持中国政府努力帮助内陆欠发达地区赶上发展较快的沿海地区。为实现上述目标，本项目将协助重庆市：（1）大幅降低污染水平，对污染最严重的钢铁行业生产企业进行重组；（2）制定一项战略并编制一份长期规划，通过提升中国环境监管框架的效力及提高污染管理能力等措施，大幅降低整个工业领域的污染水平；（3）启动实施试点项目，协助其它行业的工业企业调正其生产结构，控制污染并进行公司化改制。本项目的具体内容如下（1）支持制定并实施经济和环境政策议程和行动计划；（2）搬迁重庆两大污染钢铁厂变迁；（3）调整工业企业咨询服务结构；（4）提供转贷款，支持实施工业企业改革、污染治理和重组方案；（5）提供技术援助，加强环境监管，支持剩余劳动力再就业和国有资产管理创新。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
